com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.processors

Class ExtensionViewProcessorAdapter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.processors.EntityViewProcessorAdapter
      • com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.processors.ExtensionViewProcessorAdapter<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntityViewProcessor

    public abstract class ExtensionViewProcessorAdapter<T>
extends EntityViewProcessorAdapter
    Base class for managing an extension component on a view. Specialization of EntityViewProcessorAdapter that gives you easier access to a typed extension class. Generally useful if a single processor manages the extension rendering, validation, update actions etc.
    Since:
    3.0.0
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme

    • Method Detail

      • controlPrefix

        protected final String controlPrefix()
        Returns:
        the control prefix for binding properties to this extension object

      • extensionName

        protected String extensionName()
        Optionally provide a unique key of the extension. If not overridden, the short class name will be used. It's advised for shared processors to define their own unique name.
        Returns:
        unique key of the extension
